meanings.definition: The branch of molecular biology concerned with the structure, function, evolution, and mapping of genomes.
meanings.sent1: Genomics helps scientists understand how genes work together in living things.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use genomics to explore the genetic makeup of various organisms.
meanings.sent3: The genomics class was so interesting that even the lab mice wanted to join!
meanings.sent4: In the vast library of life, genomics is the key that unlocks the secrets of our genetic code.
meanings.sent5: The field of genomics is like a genetic treasure map, revealing the hidden pathways of our DNA.

meanings.definition: The study of all the genes in an organism.
meanings.sent1: Genomics allows scientists to examine all the genes present in a single cell.
meanings.sent2: The field of genomics has revolutionized our understanding of heredity.
meanings.sent3: When the DNA decided to throw a party, genomics was the guest of honor!
meanings.sent4: Exploring genomics is like diving into a genetic ocean, discovering the diversity of genes.
meanings.sent5: The study of genomics is like peering into a genetic kaleidoscope, revealing the intricate patterns of our genes.
